definition: in the shape of a coil, a structure consisting of something wound in a continuous series of loops
details:
adjective
- in the shape of a coil
= example: in the shape of a coil
noun
- a structure consisting of something wound in a continuous series of loops
= example: a structure consisting of something wound in a continuous series of loops
- an ornament consisting of a curve on a plane that winds around a center with an increasing distance from the center
= example: an ornament consisting of a curve on a plane that winds around a center with an increasing distance from the center
